[ {Sin has climbed onto #0's back.}, {Who gave $0 the right to act as a judge?}, ]

collection.name: Nail and Hammer
collection.openText: They said that its nail and hammer judged those guilty of sin.

observe.desc: [ {Lately, the sound of metal being hammered had been echoing in Sonya's dreams. Ding—! Ding—! Ding—! One strike after another, the crisp yet piercing clang of metal reverberated through the empty space. In an instant, light burst forth, sparks flying in all directions. But the sound quickly waned, the light instantly retreating into shadow. And just when she thought it was all about to end, it came again. One strike after another, ceaseless and unrelenting, never granting her peace.} ]

[ {She had come up with countless excuses to evade the task, yet she was still assigned to its containment unit. But she knew this was no mere coincidence. It must have been Luzhin! He must have said something to the department head, forcing her into this dreadful duty! Ever since the containment breach a month ago, he had harbored nothing but resentment toward her. Though he had never voiced it outright, she knew exactly why. Sonya had gotten his sister, Dunya, killed. It was out of this personal grudge that Luzhin had assigned her to the Containment Unit he knew she loathed the most.} ]

[ {- Judge her, then. In the place of me, who cannot.
As Luzhin watched Sonya walk toward the Containment Unit, his heart pounded harder than it had the day he had first submitted his job application. From the way she looked at him, he could tell what she thought of him. And she had guessed right, he had used his position to force this assignment upon her. But don't be mistaken! Luzhin inwardly argued, in his mind, with the neighbors who looked at him with cold eyes. Yes, he hated Sonya, but not merely because of Dunya. What he loathed most was her arrogance, that insufferable air of self-righteousness, as if she were flawless, untouchable. It was that contemptuous disregard for others that made his teeth grind with rage. That was why he had secretly altered the orders, ensuring she was sent to work with that Abnormality again and again. And do not think this was mere petty spite. He had not done this simply to make her suffer. He intended to kill Sonya! This was no abuse of power. This was premeditated murder!} ]

[ {The plan was proceeding smoothly. No one would find it suspicious. This was standard procedure, any workplace casualties were attributed solely to employee negligence. The upper management's directives were beyond question. It was all written clearly in the handbook.
She would die in that Containment Unit. The nail would pierce her eye, drive through her skull. Luzhin could already see it, that future unfolding before him, so vivid it was as if it had already happened.
Feigning nonchalance, he left the break room and stepped into the passage. ...} ]

[ {The door wouldn't open. The containment unit was locked. Sonya clawed at the door in a frenzy, digging her nails into the cracks and pulling with all her might. It didn't take long before her nails peeled away from her fingers, exposing the tender flesh beneath. Blood streamed from her hands, but she had no time to feel pain. She pounded on the door with such force that her bones threatened to shatter, her joints on the verge of dislocation.
- Let me out!
She screamed, but there was no reply. Through the window, she caught one last glimpse of Luzhin. His lips curled ever so slightly, as if he were smiling, mocking her impending doom. She shrieked his name, smearing the window with crimson handprints.
- I will...} ]

[ {Only the hammering remained, echoing endlessly in Luzhin's ears.
Ding—! Ding—! Ding—!
Light flared, blood splattered.} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: When working with $0, the employee gained a stack of Guilt everytime they produced a NE-Box.
When the work result was not Good, the employee was attacked by $0.
$0 used its Nail or its Hammer to attack. $0 normally used the Nail, but the higher the Guilt the employee had, the more probable $0 would use the Hammer to attack.

Upon being attacked by the Nail, the employee takes a midium amount of R damage and gains 5 stacks of Guilt; upon being attacked by the Hammer, the employee takes a large amount of R damage and takes W damage which the amount depends on the Guilt the employee has.
When an employee had more than 10 stacks of Guilt, they panicked.
Normally, the employees could adjust their mental states to clear up the Guilt progressively. The higher the Justice level the employee has, the faster the Guilt can be cleared up.
However, when panicked, the Guilt within the employee lost control and turned into reality.
